title: Somers Finance Board backs $37M budget | News | journalinquirer.com - Journal Inquirer
content: Somers Finance Board backs $37M budget | News | journalinquirer.com  Journal Inquirer
description: SOMERS — The Board of Finance on Tuesday unanimously approved a proposed $37 million general fund budget for 2022-23 — a reduction of $723,912 from the original requests — but
